entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
